SqlDynamic: update ft_T_ntel set notfcn_stat_typ = 'CLOSED' , last_chg_usr_id = 'IMS-36428' where notfcn_id in ('3','4','6','8','78','232','564','206','89','181','153','230','359','541','7','517','16','911') and notfcn_stat_typ = 'OPEN' and msg_typ in ('Eagle_GSInstrument','Eagle_GSInstrumentIssuerRelation','WSO_Asset','LRD_Contract','NVNBBPerSecLoans','NVNBBPerSecNonLoans','GS_ADDTNLDMN','Eagle_GSIssuer','Eagle_GSIssuerXREF','MarketFeeds_BB','Eagle_GSIssuerRelation') and lst_notfcn_tms::Date = sysdate()::Date;update ft_t_ntel set notfcn_stat_typ = 'CLOSED' , last_chg_usr_id = 'IMS-36428'where source_id like  '%vd%' and notfcn_stat_typ = 'OPEN' and msg_typ in ('Eagle_GSInstrument','Eagle_GSInstrumentIssuerRelation','WSO_Asset','LRD_Contract','NVNBBPerSecLoans','NVNBBPerSecNonLoans','GS_ADDTNLDMN','Eagle_GSIssuer','Eagle_GSIssuerXREF','MarketFeeds_BB','Eagle_GSIssuerRelation');update ft_t_ntel set notfcn_stat_typ = 'CLOSED' , last_chg_usr_id = 'IMS-36428'where msg_typ like  '%NRE%' and notfcn_stat_typ = 'OPEN' and notfcn_id in ('77')
